sourcesContent:
import './App.css' import { React,useEffect,useState,useRef } from 'react' export default function Controls({startGame,resetRef,controlRef,playRef,resetFn,start_count,subRef,autoTextFn,setDisabled,comp_speed,setComp_speed,setIndex,setLevel}) { function gameOver(txt){ start_count=750 autoTextFn(txt,subRef.current) setIndex(0) playRef.current.classList.remove('disabled') controlRef.current.classList.remove('centered') controlRef.current.classList.add('space-evenly') setDisabled(d => d = true) setComp_speed(start_count) setComp_tile_delay(comp_speed/2) setLevel(0) setComp([]) human = [] setTimeout(()=>{ setGameStarted(false) },1500) } return (
play_arrow
restart_alt
) }
